question: You applied for a new passport, and it got delayed. Due to this delay, you missed your (study) intake. You are very disappointed over this delay. Write a letter to Regional Passport Office for the same. In your letter • introduce yourself • describe what happened and how you are at loss • ssay what you wantthe officer to do
text: My name is Nikita, and my passport number is YH75432. I am writing this letter to show my disappointment regarding the delay caused by your officers in issuing my new passport. The application number is THY67899.

Let me elaborate on the situation. I applied for a new passport on 15th April 2021 as the expiration of my old passport was 1st June 2021. Thereafter I had a flight to Canada and I was traveling abroad for my further studies on 3rd July 2021. As per the passport office website, the standard processing time for a new passport is 30 days, however, in my case, it took more than a month. This delay caused me to miss the 2021 intake.

For this reason, I would request you to do an investigation on this matter and share the reason for the delay caused. Lost time would not be compensated by any means but I would like to have an apology letter from your department.
Looking forward to hearing from you at the earliest.

error_list.error_des: The spelling of traveling is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
